tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LivestockHealth (
    tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    heart_rate INT,
    health_status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE animal_health_data (
    animal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    rfid_tag_id UUID,
    temperature FLOAT,
    heart_rate INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    battery_level FLOAT,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_type VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  weight FLOAT,
  health_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE RFIDTags (
  tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tag_number INT,
  animal_id INT,
  last_scan_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthSensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_location VARCHAR(100),
  sensor_reading FLOAT,
  last_update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE LivestockHealthData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT,
    sensor_id INT,
    health_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (livestock_id) REFERENCES Livestock(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES HealthSensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    breed STRING,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    weight DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE HealthSensors (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_id UUID,
    sensor_type STRING,
    reading DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE VisitHistory (
    visit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    veterinarian_id UUID,
    livestock_id UUID,
    visit_date DATE,
    diagnosis STRING
);
